Summary: I thought it was a bright star but it moved
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my living room it was about 10 pm and I remembered I had my backpack in the car. I went out to get it and I stepped out side and looked up at the moon, I noticed a bright star and I was drawn to it and kept looking at it. I then thought it must be a plane but it was still and not moving at all. I looked closer and I noticed it was circular and I thought oh shi* its not a plane I ran in the house and grabbed my cell phone. as I started recording, the object moved very fast to the left of the moon then down and up back to the right of the moon. It kept moving and I knew it wasnt a plane! or a shooting star. it kept moving back and fourth up and down it was amazing! Then it stopped for a while and just disapeared. I forgot that I needed something from the car and just went inside and went to sleep.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Goleta
There were no other sightings in Goleta on or around September 9th 2008
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
